# isRegularFile

**Instance Property**

This property contains a boolean value that indicates whether the file wrapper object is a regular-file.

## Declaration

```swift
var isRegularFile: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the file wrapper object is a regular-file wrapper, otherwise it contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Invocations of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/read(from:options:)] may change the value of this property if the type of the file on disk has changed.

## Querying File Wrappers

- **isDirectory**: This property contains a boolean value indicating whether the file wrapper is a directory file wrapper.
- **isSymbolicLink**: A boolean that indicates whether the file wrapper object is a symbolic-link file wrapper.
